CustomField.formula: (CASE( Accuracy_Score__c , "0", 0, "1", 1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE( Chatter_Utilization_Score__c , "0", 0, "1", 1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE( Pace_Score__c, "0", 0, "1", 1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE( Scheduling_Score__c , "0", 0, "1", 1, "2",2, 0)+ CASE( Resourcing_Score__c, "0", 0, "1", 1, "2",2, 0))/(10- (CASE(Accuracy_Score__c , "NA",2,0)+ CASE( Chatter_Utilization_Score__c , "NA",2,0)+ CASE( Pace_Score__c, "NA",2,0)+ CASE( Scheduling_Score__c , "NA",2,0)+ CASE( Resourcing_Score__c, "NA",2,0)))
CustomField.label: Project Manager's Score
